Author: AbandonedDragon
Text: My boyfriend dumped me recently. I’ve been having meltdown the past couple weeks so that’s cool. I thought we were going to get engaged soon but instead this. I’ve been told I can keep our shared living space if I can pay rent on my own but i don’t think I can even though it’s cheaper than any other place without roommates. I’m miserable. I want him to come back.

Author: blittz2018
Text: I understand. I was dumped a couple days ago, so I understand it hurts. My love is with you right now. <3
